      Methods in com.betterfb that return types with arguments of type User 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      List<User> UserRepository.findFriendsReceived​(Long userId)
      Finds all users who have sent and whose friend requests have been accepted by the given user.
      List<User> UserRepository.findFriendsSent​(Long userId)
      Finds all users which have accepted a friend request from the given user.
      List<User> UserRepository.findUsersForFriendSearch​(String searchQuery, Long loggedInUserId)
      Finds all users which match the given search query in their username, name or surname.
